title: You take a break from League to got to a restaurant. The waiter asks what salad you would like.
body:
[](http://cdn.skim.gs/image/upload/v1456339117/msi/ceasar-salad-recipe_jwwpfl.jpg)
https://media.tenor.co/images/bb9696da242639908b1131c81739d681/tenor.gif

...I rocked that one. Crushed it so hard nobody would dare cross me.

replies.body:
Alright, real talk for a moment. I knew Caesar was gonna get killed, but, holy shit, that scene made me tear up.

 I just want my Italian bubble dude back. ;(

Araki really got me, because they said "we have no time to mourn."

Then the blood trickled under the stone and the opera singer reached his climax.
i usually go for the... tossed... salad. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Ya know this joke left me feeling pretty _bubblely_
why is there a giant concrete cross in my salad?
